Title: Timer Auto-pause
Steps: Step 1: Create Task A and Task B
Description: Verify that starting a new timer pauses others

Title: Timer Auto-pause
Steps: Step 2: Start timer on Task A
Expected Result: Timer starts counting for Task A

Title: Timer Auto-pause
Steps: Step 3: Start timer on Task B
Expected Result: Timer for Task A pauses automatically; Task B starts

Title: Timer Auto-pause
Steps: Step 4: Stop timer on Task B
